en: And We inspired to the mother of Moses,
but when you fear for him,
and do not fear and do not grieve.
and do not fear and do not grieve.
Indeed, We will return him to you
and will make him [one] of the messengers."
And the family of Pharaoh picked him up [out of the river]
so that he would become to them an enemy and a [cause of] grief.

ar: إِنَّ فِرْعَوْنَ وَهَمَنَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا كَانُوا خَطِِٔينَ
en: Indeed, Pharaoh and Haman and their soldiers were deliberate sinners.
